item.description:
We are all going to meet in front of the 13 Forest Gallery at 8:30 and I will hold a sign with the word meetup on it. there is an opening for the perfect activity for this day so we need to leap for the chance to see an exhibition called LEAP including 4 New England artists. They are going to help everyone link nature to our curious minds.

Please take a look at there website HTTP://WWW.13FORESTGALLERY.COM to have a better understanding of the showing and to see why we are going to get to have a HOPPING part with the artists.

Hope you will leap from February to March in the best fashion ever.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be holding a meetup sign
item.why: This day happens once every four years and what better way to celebrate than with...
item.name: Leap Exhibit and Celebration at the 13 Forest Gallery
